id.description: Unique identifier for the marketer entity.

currency.description: Currency used by the marketer for transactions.

creationTime.description: Time when the marketer entity was created.

lastModified.description: Time when the marketer entity was last modified.

campaignDefaults.description: Default settings for campaigns created by the marketer.

blockedSites.description: Data related to blocked sites by the marketer.

blockedPublishers.description: List of publishers that are blocked by the marketer.

id.description: Unique identifier for the blocked publisher.

creationTime.description: Time of creation for the blocked publisher.

modifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the blocked publisher.

blockedSections.description: List of site sections that are blocked by the marketer.

id.description: Unique identifier for the blocked section.

publisher.description: Details of the publisher associated with the blocked section.

creationTime.description: Time of creation for the blocked section.

modifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the blocked section.

useFirstPartyCookie.description: Flag indicating whether the marketer uses first-party cookies for tracking.

role.description: Role or position of the marketer within the organization.

permissions.description: List of permissions assigned to the marketer.
